title: Today’s Worst Stocks Are a Bunch of Semiconductors and Some Garbage, Too
text:
3:04 p.m. With one hour left in the day, a quick glance at the 10 worst stocks in the S&P 500 show a consistent theme—investors are scared of semiconductor stocks. They’re not terribly fond of garbage, either.

Of the 10 worst stocks in the S&P 500 at 3:04 p.m., seven of them are semiconductor stocks. That’s no surprise following Texas Instruments’ (TXN) disappointing earnings, which appears to have rekindled worries that the chip market hadn’t bottomed yet. That explains the presence of Analog Devices (ADI), Microchip...
description: With one hour left in the day, a quick glance at the 10 worst stocks in the S&P 500 show a consistent theme—investors are scared of semiconductor stocks. They’re not terribly fond of garbage, either.
